name: Asunder (Shiniy)
description:
This is a small game we have made for an university project. It is not perfect but we hope it can be an enjoyable first attempt.

All assets are hand drawn by myself, while the concept, level design and mechanics were a collaborative effort.

Team members: Marculescu Cornelia Gabriela, David Cornelia Gabriela, Alexe Rares Gabriel, Ionescu Ozana Maria
